subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: One of the two anabolic steroids for which Alex Rodriguez tested positive, according to reports, was Primobolan, a drug that is illegal to sell or market in the United States.
snippet: One of the two anabolic steroids for which Alex Rodriguez tested positive, according to reports, was Primobolan, a drug that is illegal to sell or market in the United States.
